text: Thomas Jefferson "Tom" Barlow III (August 7, 1940 - January 31, 2017) was an American politician. Born in Washington, D.C., he was a Democrat. He represented Kentucky in the United States House of Representatives from 1993 to 1995. Barlow died on January 31, 2017 in Paducah, Kentucky, at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas Barlow (Kentucky)
